group_1.textLeft: What's wrong?
Your eyes are darting all over the place.

group_1.textRight: My usual meals out don't tend to feel this@high class.
It's hard to relax.

group_1.textLeft: There's no need to worry about your table@manners or anything.
My dad's friend owns this restaurant.@I come here all the time.

group_1.textRight: Since you're the one who invited us...
Is it safe to assume you're paying?

group_1.textLeft: Sure, no problem!
We have so much money at home and@I earn a lot myself.

group_1.textRight: I, Alina, also make quite a lot off of my@masterpieces.

group_1.textLeft: Are you okay, Mami?

group_1.textRight: Y-yes...
This conversation is on another level...@I had trouble keeping up.

group_1.textLeft: *Giggle* You're right.
I'm used to it now, but even that feels a @little surreal.

group_1.textRight: Wait, it's possible to get used to this?

group_1.textLeft: Yes.

group_1.textRight: By the way, will there only be two Magius@joining us tonight?

group_1.textLeft: I invited our third, but she said she's going@to eat at home today.
So they got away, huh?

group_1.textRight: I may have let my guard down after seeing@familiar faces...
They also surprised me with a clever trick.@It caught me quite off guard.
I'm sorry, I'm just making excuses now.

group_1.textLeft: It's disappointing, but things can't always@go according to plan.
Not to mention, you're always helping us out.
We can't complain about your contributions.
Right, right!
You're doing a great job compared to@those flute sisters.
They were sent to help with a Witch today@and let it escape instead, right? Peggiore!

group_1.textRight: That was because a Black Feather...

group_1.textLeft: Since they were the ones in charge,@shouldn't they be held responsible?
Well, that is what I expect from them.@It's nothing new.

group_1.textRight: I'm kind of worried though.
Thanks to our lecture, we have three new@friends, but...
The potential for trouble remains, after all.

group_1.textLeft: Be patient, Touka.
We've been quietly working towards freedom@all this time.
Let's try not to make things worse by@taking drastic measuresâ€”

group_1.textRight: But we're SO CLOSE!

group_1.textLeft: I spoke out of turn...

group_1.textCenter: Here are your salmon and cheese crepe@hors d'oeuvres.

group_1.textRight: Ah...
[chara:100701:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]I'm sorry, Mifuyu. I shouldn't have yelled.

group_1.textLeft: Please don't worry about it.

group_1.textRight: Anyway, let's just enjoy our meal for now.

group_1.textLeft: Yes, let's dive into this delizioso dinner.

group_1.textRight: Sure.
